name: Facebook Chat - Fully restore the old colors
description:
Get the good old facebook chat back !!!
App style chat is here on Facebook on desktop, and you don't like it?
No problem, you can easily get rid of it.

With this style you can get the old colors back, and remove the obnoxious messenger styled chat.
Enjoy.


Comments, suggestions, report problems,
All are welcomed.
Just start a normal discussion, no need to rate it.
additional_info: ** NOTE ** Tested and fully working on Firefox, Chrome, Opera v1 *23.07.2016* - initial release - backgrounds on header and chat area, hovered and non-hovered - white text on header - message bubbles, borders, text & background color v2 *24.07.2016* - add "chat buttons" styles (hovered, minimized and normal state) - highlighting of header when received new message v3 *25.07.2016* - redone the whole style from scratch - it is now a full restore of the old colors, with the added bonus of flashing the chat window on a new message v4 *25.07.2016* - fix link bubbles - they are now fully restored to their original colors and sizes v5 *27.07.2016* - fix for the new buttons icon image v6 *03.08.2016* - fix missing chat icons v7 *07.08.2016* - fix icons sometimes blinking v8 *08.08.2016* - fix sticker/emoji background & borders - fix link/file/media bubbles v9 *16.08.2016* - started fixing facebook's problems *sigh* - fix clicking below the header minimizing the chat v10 *23.08.2016* (milestone achieved: one month after the initial version) - fix border on minimized chat, and collapsed/opened small chat & sidebar - fix minimized and small chat sidebar v11 *29.08.2016* - fix gif source name background & border v12 *15.09.2016* - fix for missing buttons v13 *17.09.2016* - fix misaligned bubbles v14 *10.10.2016* - fix first link not having top border - fix some bubbles without background v15 *07.11.2016* - fix audio message colors and unnecessary shrinking v16 *01.02.2017* - fix problem with background on certain messages - unset background-size on buttons v17 *03.05.2017* - fix the icons again, this time hopefully permanently v18 *22.03.2017* - fix small problem with header v19 *20.08.2017* - fix minimized chat title v20 *18.04.2018* - some minor fixes v21 *09.05.2018* - fix bubble colors v22 *27.07.2018* - fix status colors v23 *11.09.2018* - fix background .
